entry.title: Interesting Systems Links for September 3, 2012
entry.summary:
Here is a small selection of sysadmin links that I recently found, and wanted to share:

  • Blameless PostMortems and a Just Culture - Code as Craft
    • some really good ideas about a culture that recognizes and seeks to remedy human errors, rather than punishing and generating fear.
  • The first pillar: We …
entry.content:
Here is a small selection of sysadmin links that I recently found, and wanted to share:

  • Blameless PostMortems and a Just Culture - Code as Craft
    • some really good ideas about a culture that recognizes and seeks to remedy human errors, rather than punishing and generating fear.
  • The first pillar: We alert on what we draw - Agile Sysadmin
  • Puppet SSL explained - Masterzen’s Blog
  • Unix Orchestration Roundup: Tools for Programmatic Systems Administration
